overview.description: The best property of JCL IBM is its ability to automate and manage complex batch processing tasks efficiently through detailed step-by-step job control.

dd_statement.logic:
DELETE FPTLT01.DEMO.CARDDEMO.ACCTDATA.VSAM.KSDS -
          CLUSTER
   IF MAXCC LE 08 THEN SET MAXCC = 0

DEFINE CLUSTER (NAME(FPTLT01.DEMO.CARDDEMO.ACCTDATA.VSAM.KSDS)     -
          CYLINDERS(1 5)                                              -
          VOLUMES(USER04)                                             -
          KEYS(11 0)                                                  -
          RECORDSIZE(300 300)                                         -
          SHAREOPTIONS(2 3)                                           -
          ERASE                                                       -
          INDEXED                                                     -
          )                                                           -
          DATA (NAME(FPTLT01.DEMO.CARDDEMO.ACCTDATA.VSAM.KSDS.DAT))   -
          INDEX (NAME(FPTLT01.DEMO.CARDDEMO.ACCTDATA.VSAM.KSDS.IDX))

step_list.property: The JCL step "STEP15" executes the IDCAMS program to copy data from a physical sequential dataset to a VSAM dataset.
